const BoardDetail = ({ article, handlelist }) => { console.log("BoardDetail =>", article); const image = "http://localhost:8008/uploads/" + article.board_image; console.log("image =>", image); return (
글번호 {article.board_num}
제목 {article.board_title}
글쓴이 {article.board_writer}
글쓴날짜 {article.board_date}
글내용 {article.board_content}
이미지
); }; export default BoardDetail;
